sentence.Network_en: In an unclouded harmony of tastes and interests they cultivated ferns in Wardian cases.
sentence.Network_cn: 出于和谐一致的兴趣和爱好,他们在沃德式的玻璃罩盒子里种植文竹.

sentence.Network_en: It is sunny and unclouded today, let's go to the amusement park.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天天空响晴, 我们去游乐场玩玩 吧!
